enum.name: PortDirection
enum.description: The direction of the synchronization interface.

enumMember.name: BIDIRECTION
enumMember.description: The port can input and output signal.

enumMember.name: INPUT_ONLY
enumMember.description:
The port can only input signals.
It cannot output any signals.

enumMember.name: OUTPUT_ONLY
enumMember.description:
The port can only output signals.
It cannot input any signals.

enum.name: AvailStatus
enum.description: The availability status is used to qualify the operational state. It indicates why the operational state has changed its value.

enumMember.name: IN_TEST
enumMember.description: The resource is undergoing a test procedure. If the administrative state is locked or shutting down then normal users are precluded from using the resource.

enumMember.name: FAILED
enumMember.description: The resource has an internal fault that prevents it from operating.

enumMember.name: POWER_OFF
enumMember.description: The resource requires power to be applied and is not powered on.

enumMember.name: OFF_LINE
enumMember.description: The resource requires a routine operation to be performed. This routine operation is to place the resource online and make it available for use. The operation may be manual or automatic, or both. The operational state is disabled.

enumMember.name: OFF_DUTY
enumMember.description: The resource has been made inactive by an internal control process.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY
enumMember.description: The resource cannot operate because some other resource on which it depends is unavailable.

enumMember.name: DEGRADED
enumMember.description: The service available from the resource is degraded in some respect.

enumMember.name: NOT_INSTALLED
enumMember.description: The resource represented by the managed object is not present, or is incomplete.

enumMember.name: LOG_FULL
enumMember.description: This indicates a log full condition.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_LOCKED
enumMember.description: The administrative state of a resource that this resource depends on is locked. or the availability status of the other resource is dependency locked.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_FAILED
enumMember.description: The availability status of a resource that this resource depends on is failed or dependency failed.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_SHUTTINGDOWN
enumMember.description: The administrative state of a resource that this resource depends on is shutting down. or the availability status of the other resource is dependency shutting down.

enum.name: SsmLocation
enum.description:
Where the SSM code is located.
It is only available when syncIO works in 2MBits mode.

enumMember.name: SA4
enumMember.description: SSM code locates in SA4.

enumMember.name: SA5
enumMember.description: SSM code locates in SA5.

enumMember.name: SA6
enumMember.description: SSM code locates in SA6.

enumMember.name: SA7
enumMember.description: SSM code locates in SA7.

enumMember.name: SA8
enumMember.description: SSM code locates in SA8.

enum.name: SyncIOMode
enum.description: Frequency mode of the synchronization IO port.

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_2048KHZ
enumMember.description: Frequency SyncIO works in 2048KHz mode.

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_2MBITS
enumMember.description: Frequency SyncIO works in 2MBits mode.

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_1544KBITS
enumMember.description: Frequency SyncIO works in 1.544MBits mode.

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_1_5MHZ
enumMember.description: Frequency SyncIO works in 1.5MHz mode.

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_6_3MHZ
enumMember.description:
Frequency SyncIO works in 6.3MHz mode.
Optional to support - Flag : if-feature FequencySyncIOMode6_3MHZ

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_64KHZ
enumMember.description:
Frequency SyncIO works in 64KHz mode.
Optional to support - Flag : if-feature FequencySyncIOMode64KHZ

enumMember.name: UNKNOWN_MODE
enumMember.description: Unknown mode.

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_1PPS
enumMember.description: Frequency synchronization IO works in 1PPS mode.

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_2_MHZ
enumMember.description: Frequency synchronization IO works in 2 MHz mode.

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_25MHZ
enumMember.description:
Frequency SyncIO works in 25MHZ mode.
Optional to support - Flag : if-feature FequencySyncIOMode25MHZ

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_15MHZ
enumMember.description:
Frequency SyncIO works in 15MHZ mode.
Optional to support - Flag : if-feature FequencySyncIOMode15MHZ

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_10_MHZ
enumMember.description: Frequency synchronization IO works in 10 MHz mode.

enumMember.name: FREQUENCY_1544KHZ
enumMember.description: Frequency SyncIO works in 1544KHZ mode.

enum.name: LinkStatus
enum.description:
Link status.
It is deceided by the physical status of underlying implementation.

enumMember.name: LINK_UNKONWN
enumMember.description: Indicates that can't get the status.

enumMember.name: LINK_UP
enumMember.description: Indicates that link is up.

enumMember.name: LINK_DOWN
enumMember.description: Indicates that link is down.

enum.name: OperState
enum.description: The operational states of a resource.

enumMember.name: DISABLED
enumMember.description: The resource is totally inoperable.

enumMember.name: ENABLED
enumMember.description: The resource is partially or fully operable.

enumMember.name: ENABLED
enumMember.description: Function is enabled.

enumMember.name: DISABLED
enumMember.description: Function is disabled.

enum.name: AdmState
enum.description: The administrative state of a resource.

enumMember.name: LOCKED
enumMember.description: The resource is administratively prohibited from performing services for its users.

enumMember.name: UNLOCKED
enumMember.description: The resource is administratively permitted to perform services for its users. This is independent of its inherent operability.

enumMember.name: SHUTTINGDOWN
enumMember.description: Use of the resource is administratively permitted to existing instances of use only. While the system remains in the shutting down state the manager may at any time cause the managed object to revert to the locked state.

class.name: FrequencySyncIO
class.description: The MO class specifies that a physical synchronization port is used for frequency synchronization.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert test='every $frequencySyncIOId in @frequencySyncIOId satisfies (every $encapsulation in @encapsulation satisfies ((count(../TimeSyncIO[($encapsulation eq @encapsulation)]) + count(../FrequencySyncIO[($frequencySyncIOId ne @frequencySyncIOId) and ($encapsulation eq @encapsulation)])) eq 0))'> <value-of select="."/> Two or more FrequencySyncIO/TimeSyncIO cannot refer to the same SyncPort in attribute encapsulation </assert> <assert test='contains(@encapsulation, "SyncPort=")'> <value-of select="."/> Attribute encapsulation of a FrequencySyncIO can only refer to a SyncPort </assert> <assert test='exists(@encapsulation)'> <value-of select="."/> MO in attribute encapsulation does not exist. </assert> <assert test='(@adminPortDirection eq 1)'><value-of select="."/> Attribute adminPortDirection of a FrequencySyncIO can only support INPUT_ONLY. </assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert test='every $frequencySyncIOId in @frequencySyncIOId satisfies (every $encapsulation in @encapsulation satisfies ((count(../TimeSyncIO[($encapsulation eq @encapsulation)]) + count(../FrequencySyncIO[($frequencySyncIOId ne @frequencySyncIOId) and ($encapsulation eq @encapsulation)])) eq 0))'> <value-of select="."/> Two or more FrequencySyncIO/TimeSyncIO cannot refer to the same SyncPort in attribute encapsulation </assert> <assert test='contains(@encapsulation, "SyncPort=")'> <value-of select="."/> Attribute encapsulation of a FrequencySyncIO can only refer to a SyncPort </assert> <assert test='exists(@encapsulation)'> <value-of select="."/> MO in attribute encapsulation does not exist. </assert> <assert test='(@adminPortDirection eq 1)'><value-of select="."/> Attribute adminPortDirection of a FrequencySyncIO can only support INPUT_ONLY. </assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: frequencySyncIOId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: linkStatus
attribute.description: Shows the link status of frequency SyncIO.

attribute.name: adminPortMode
attribute.description:
Specifies the port mode of the frequency syncIO interface.
adminPortMode is read-write attribute, used only when the port mode can be changed by user. If the mode of this syncIO is fixed, user canâ€™t set adminPortMode, admin value should be equal to operPortMode. Products can implement part of the frequency mode.

attribute.name: ssmLocation
attribute.description:
Specifies the SSM code location when frequency SyncIO works in 2MBits mode.
It is only used when frequency SyncIO works in 2MBits mode. The value shall be SA4 (default), SA5, SA6, SA7, SA8. Products could implement part of them.

attribute.name: squelch
attribute.description: Specifies if a Synchronization output will be squelched or not when the clock generating the signal is not trusted anymore.

attribute.name: adminPortDirection
attribute.description: Specifies the port direction of the frequency synchronization IO port.
attribute.dependencies: Attribute adminPortDirection of a FrequencySyncIO can only support INPUT_ONLY.

attribute.name: operPortDirection
attribute.description:
Shows the direction of the frequency syncIO interface.
operPortDirection is read-only attribute, decided by the physical status of frequency SyncIO hardware.

attribute.name: operPortMode
attribute.description: Indicates the frequency mode of the frequency synchronization IO.

attribute.name: inputSource
attribute.description:
Specifies the input source of this Frequency syncIO instance.
It is used when products implement the frequency SyncIO function as: user can select the input source to drive the output signal of syncIO directly. Products shall define which type could be used as the input sources.

attribute.name: encapsulation
attribute.description: Reference to the underlying encapsulation, which must be a SyncPort MO.
attribute.dependencies: Two or more FrequencySyncIO/TimeSyncIO cannot refer to the same SyncPort in attribute encapsulation. Attribute encapsulation of a FrequencySyncIO can only refer to a SyncPort. MO in attribute encapsulation does not exist.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description:
The availability status.
It contains details about operationalState.

attribute.name: administrativeState
attribute.description: Specifies the administrative state of the MO.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.
